headline: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) Announces Quarterly Dividend Increase To US$1.37 Per Share
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (NYSE:LYB) recently declared a quarterly dividend increase to $1.37 per share, demonstrating its ongoing focus on shareholder returns. This hike came as earnings for the first quarter revealed a decline in both revenue and net income, with sales down to $7.677 billion and net income dropping to $175 million. Despite these challenging financial results, the company's share buyback activities, in which over 5 million shares were repurchased, reflect a commitment to...

headline: LYB announces increase to quarterly dividend
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, May 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB) today announced its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.37 per share, representing a $0.03 per share increase over the company's first quarter 2025 dividend. The dividend will be paid to shareholders on June 9, 2025, with an ex-dividend and record date of June 2, 2025. “LYB continues to reward shareholders with a strong and growing dividend in 2025, which will mark 15 consecutive years of divid
